name: chdh - egregore source
short_description:
This is an adaptation of the software used by chdh for the performance egregore in 2011-2013. It is based on five different audiovisual instruments that you can directly control. They will be control via internet by chdh for a one time only live performance the 27 may 2015.

You can play, adapt, and use this audiovisual instrument for yourself. It is based on physical modeling and chaotic algorithms entirely build in the Pure Data software.
summary: Source code adaptation of the egregore performance by chdh
